ValidationRule.description: A "Reason for Closing" when case status is set to "Closed"
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: RecordType.Name <> "Legacy WCA Case" && RecordType.Name <> "Legacy Garment Case" && RecordType.Name <> "WCA" && RecordType.Name <> "Garment" && RecordType.Name <> "RCI" && ISCHANGED ( Status__c ) && ISPICKVAL( Status__c , "Closed") && ISBLANK( Reason_For_Closing__c ) && NOT( CONTAINS($Profile.Name, 'System Administrator') )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: A Reason for Closing is required for closed cases. Please fill out the "Reason for Closing" and then close again.
